knimeNode.name: Integragen Indels file
knimeNode.shortDescription: Read one Indel file produced by integragen.com

fullDescription.intro:
This node reads an "Indels" file generated by Integragen. Version: Sept 2011
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.

ports.inPort: A table with one column containing the full path to the Annotation file "SNP" from Integragen. Can be gzipped
